sentences.en: A place of residence includes a place of permanent residency and a place of habitual residence.
sentences.cn: 居住地包括户籍所在地、经常居住地.

sentences.en: Beginning July 30 , the charge for adults seeking residency will exceed 1,000 dollars.
sentences.cn: 七月三十日起, 成人申请居住权的费用会超过1000美金.

sentences.en: During our residency we collect the worn - out gloves of the labourers from the road.
sentences.cn: 在我们的进驻期间我们在路上收集了民工们穿破了的手套.
他申请了在英国的居住权。
他申请了在加拿大的居住权。

sentences.en: He is currently doing a residency program at the Platform China Contemporary Art Institute in Beijing.
sentences.cn: 目前,他在站台中国当代艺术机构做驻留艺术家.

sentences.en: Is the village ahead a Donggan residency?
sentences.cn: 前面就是东干人的村子 吗 ?

sentences.en: Levchenko remarked that a kind of sepulchral quiet seemed to pervade the Residency.
sentences.cn: 在大门旁边的盥洗室里,列夫钦科说情报站里安静得似乎有点阴森森.

sentences.en: Ma says the goal of the Rubin Museum residency is to give visitors a multi - sensory experience.
sentences.cn: 马说,鲁宾艺术博物馆所在地的目的是给游客一种多感觉体验.

sentences.en: Mr Olaechea has British residency by virtue of his marriage.
sentences.cn: 奥拉伊奇先生通过结婚而取得在英国的永久居留权。

sentences.en: On the residency programme at Organhaus I am interested in the reflex of work production.
sentences.cn: 在器空间的驻留项目中我对于作品成果的反射很感兴趣.

sentences.en: She has been granted permanent residency in Britain.
sentences.cn: 她获准在英国永久居住。

sentences.en: The residence of the settlor determines the tax residency of the trust.
sentences.cn: 设立人居住地决定该信托税务居地身份.

sentences.en: We are process - oriented , and see the residency as a place for research.
sentences.cn: 我们把进驻空间视为调查研究的场所,注重一切过程.

sentences.en: Will I be able to use an existing skills assessment to an application for permanent residency?
sentences.cn: 我能否使用现行的技术评估来申请永居?

words.tran_cn: 居住的；住院医师；定居的

trans.tran_cn: 住所，（实习医师的）高级专科住院实习期
trans.tran_en: a period of time when a doctor receives special training in a particular type of medicine, especially at a hospital
